author: FourFourTwo
description: Pablo Zabaleta shocked some of his biggest fans prior to his Manchester City departure.
title: WATCH: Pablo Zabaleta surprises Manchester City fans

author: BBC Sport
description: West Ham will sign defender Pablo Zabaleta on a free transfer once his Manchester City contract expires in June.
title: Pablo Zabaleta: West Ham to sign defender on free transfer

author: FourFourTwo
description: Pablo Zabaleta has agreed a two-year contract with West Ham and will join once his deal with Manchester City expires.
title: BREAKING NEWS: West Ham snap up Zabaleta

author: BBC Sport
description: Build-up to Saturday's FA Cup final, Pablo Zabaleta signs for West Ham, plus reaction to the French Open draw.
title: Sportsday - FA Cup final build-up and football news

author: talkSPORT
description: Manchester City have announced the departure of four more senior players whose contracts come to an end this summer. Jesus Navas, Gael Clichy, Bacary Sagna and Willy Caballero will all leave as free agents, the club confirmed on Thursday. Their departures follow that of long-serving right-back Pablo Zabaleta, who announced prior to the end of the 2016-17 he would be moving on. City announced the latest exits at regular intervals throughout the afternoon.
title: Manchester City confirm Jesus Navas, Gael Clichy, Bacary Sagna and Willy Caballero will leave Etihad Stadium this summer
